item.title: CI/CD for GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions
item.description: Looks like my blog posts are like Sherlock TV Show episodes, posting once in a while…anyways I’m back now. As you might know, GitHub recently launched GitHub Actions where people can automate workflows like build, test, and deploy code from GitHub. I have started reading docs a little bit, I have to admit, setting up workflows on GitHub Actions is not that hard. I can directly start creating a workflow from available workflow templates in the “Actions” tab.
